about_the_game:
Experience Past Mistakes in its full uncensored glory, including explicit, red-hot sex scenes in amazing 4K detail! "Past Mistakes - Adult Patch" adds sexual content to the game, as well as nude and lewd CGs and character portraits.

Venture through Cyrus's journey in this realm and the magical realm, including his many sexy encounters along the way! Discover routes and branches containing wild, explicit content! Experience all the action as originally intended, unfiltered and in stunning detail!

  • Lewd rendered CG sex scenes and erotic content in stunning 4K resolution

  • Animated sex scenes depicting all the action in high detail

  • Additional optional branches to the narrative containing exclusive sexual content

How to access the DLC:

1. Hit the "Download" button.

2. If the game opens automatically, close it.

3. Restart Steam.

4. Find Past Mistakes in your Library and launch it.

Note: If you need to uninstall and reinstall the adult patch, be sure to start a new game afterward.

content_descriptors.notes:
This add-on content adds sexual and erotic scenes, including rendered images to the base game of Past Mistakes. All characters in this game are adults aged 18 or over and all scenes and encounters are entirely consensual. Sexual and nude content is present from the outset. Sexual content includes vaginal, oral and anal sex, and non-penetrative intercourse, as well as nude scenes without sexual intercourse as an element.

Mature themes in the story of all versions include past trauma and dysfunctional relationship dynamics, Frequent profanity is present in the script, as well as sexually explicit dialogue. Violence is present in the script and renders, and dangerous combat is described and rendered accurately.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please install the necessary codecs for WEBP and WEBM if images or animations aren't displaying correctly.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 (AMD equiv.) or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please install the necessary codecs for WEBP and WEBM if images or animations aren't displaying correctly.
